author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: French death toll passes 19,000 as over 2.2m cases are reported worldwide
description: Spain reaches 20,000 deaths as number of cases in Turkey passes that in Iran
content: More than 2.26 million people have been reported to have been infected by coronavirus globally and 154,613 have died, according to a Reuters tally. Covid-19 infections have been reported in more than 210 countries and territories since the first cases of the … [+10045 chars]
